ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__Planning_Mode__c , 'StartWeekYear') , OR( IF( AND(cgcloud__Active__c = true , ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Initial_Year__c))), true, false), IF( AND( !ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Initial_Year__c)), VALUE(TEXT(cgcloud__Initial_Year__c)) > Year(Today())) , true, false) ), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Initial Year can't be empty and equal or sooner than the current year if the Planning Mode is 'StartWeekYear' and Active is checked.
